mapper.insert: insert into order (ord_id, ord_type, ord_number, ord_product_name, ord_weight, ord_mailer, ord_address, ord_receiving, ord_state, ord_phone, ord_consignee, ord_con_phone, ord_start_city, ord_midpoint_city, ord_end_city, ord_price, ord_transit_price, ord_total_price, ord_vehicle, ord_remarks) values (#{ordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordMailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordReceiving,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordConsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordStartCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordMidpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordEndCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ordTransitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ordTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ordVehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set ord_type = #{ordType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ord_number = #{ordNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_product_name = #{ordProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_weight = #{ordWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ord_mailer = #{ordMailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_address = #{ordAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_receiving = #{ordReceiving,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_state = #{ordState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ord_phone = #{ordPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_consignee = #{ordConsignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_con_phone = #{ordConPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_start_city = #{ordStartCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_midpoint_city = #{ordMidpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_end_city = #{ordEndCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_price = #{ordPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ord_transit_price = #{ordTransitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ord_total_price = #{ordTotalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ord_vehicle = #{ordVehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ord_remarks = #{ordRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ord_id = #{ordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ord_id, ord_type, ord_number, ord_product_name, ord_weight, ord_mailer, ord_address, ord_receiving, ord_state, ord_phone, ord_consignee, ord_con_phone, ord_start_city, ord_midpoint_city, ord_end_city, ord_price, ord_transit_price, ord_total_price, ord_vehicle, ord_remarks from order where ord_id = #{ordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
